alert.note: Alert for Lower St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 4:23PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Iberia and southeastern St. Martin Parishes through 515 PM CDT... At 423 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Bayou Sorrel, or 13 miles northwest of Belle River, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stephensville, Belle River, Bayou Geneve and Pierre Part. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central Louisiana.
